      • setOption

        public void setOption(String name,
             boolean value)
               throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: IOptions
        Convenience method for setting options with boolean values. Calling this method is equivalent to calling setOption(name, Boolean.toString(value));.
        Specified by:
        setOption in interface IOptions
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the option to set
        value - The boolean value.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurs persisting the updated options to the aggregator properties file.

      • setOption

        public void setOption(String name,
             String value)
               throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: IOptions
        Sets the named option to the specified value.

        Use this method sparingly. Calling this method results in options listeners being called to inform them that the options have changed. Some listeners react to this by performing actions that can have significant adverse effects on performance. The cache manager, for example, purges the cache of all cached responses.

        This method should not generally be called as part of normal operation of the aggregator. I may be called, for example, by a console command handler that allows admins or developers to set properties while the server is running. Changes to options made using this method are persisted to the properties file.

        Specified by:
        setOption in interface IOptions
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the option to set
        value - The new option value. If null, then name is reset to its default value.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurs persisting the updated options to the aggregator properties file.

      • loadProps

        protected Properties loadProps(Properties props)
        Loads the Options properties from the aggregator properties file into the specified properties object. If the properties file does not exist, then try to load from the bundle.
        Parameters:
        props - The properties object to load. May be initialized with default values.
        Returns:
        The properties file specified by props.

                  throws IOException

        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • updateNotify

        Notify options change listeners that Options have been updated
        Parameters:

      • propertiesFileUpdated

        protected void propertiesFileUpdated(Properties updated,
                         long sequence)
        Listener method for being informed of changes to the properties file by another instance of this class. Called by other instances of this class for instances that use the same properties file when properties are saved.
        Parameters:
        updated - the updated properties
        sequence - the update sequence number

      • propsFileUpdateNotify

        protected void propsFileUpdateNotify(Properties updatedProps,
                         long sequence)
        Notify implementations of this class that are listening for properties file updates on the same properties file that the properties file has been updated.
        Parameters:
        updatedProps - the updated properties
        sequence - the update sequence number
